SEARCH
Package gl.model

Class GLModel

java.lang.Object
gl.model.GLModel
public class GLModel extends Object
The GLModel class represents the model of the Game of Life. It manages the game board, game rules, and provides methods for controlling the game. This class is responsible for maintaining the state of the Game of Life, including the game board, game rules, and game execution.

  • Constructor Details

    • GLModel

      public GLModel(int rows, int cols, ResourceBundle bundle, GLView glView)
      Constructs a new GameOfLifeModel with the specified number of rows and columns.
      Parameters:
      rows - The number of rows in the game board.
      cols - The number of columns in the game board.
      bundle - The ResourceBundle for localization.
      glView - The GLFooter instance to update with game changes.

  • Method Details

    • isRunning

      public boolean isRunning()
      Checks if the game is currently running.
      Returns:
      True if the game is running, false otherwise.

      public void startGame(String steps)
      Starts the game with the specified number of steps or infinitely if steps is empty.
      Parameters:
      steps - The number of steps to run the game, or an empty string for infinite mode.

      Resets the step counter to 1.
